5137f51e-8aaf-481b-858a-6fdb7b0b6f12.title: CS
5137f51e-8aaf-481b-858a-6fdb7b0b6f12.summary: Counter-Strike is an objective-based, multiplayer tactical first-person shooter. Two opposing teams—the Terrorists and the Counter Terrorists—compete in game modes to complete objectives, such as securing a location to plant or defuse a bomb and rescuing or guarding hostages.

1fd2b0d1-65f9-4d4a-8731-bfa87846e531.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
1fd2b0d1-65f9-4d4a-8731-bfa87846e531.summary: A young boy named Link is tasked with stopping the evil king Ganondorf from obtaining the Triforce, a sacred relic that grants its holder ultimate power.

0c8d98d0-fe9a-463b-9912-2eba76923cf1.title: Perfect Dark
0c8d98d0-fe9a-463b-9912-2eba76923cf1.summary: Joanna Dark, an agent of the Carrington Institute, must uncover a conspiracy involving an alien race and a shadowy corporation.

58db6fc7-9b50-4d57-9c15-098315333594.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
58db6fc7-9b50-4d57-9c15-098315333594.summary: A skateboarding video game where players complete tricks and objectives to earn points and unlock new levels and skaters.

8bff6f08-c2d0-4f1a-a360-b47235a92dea.title: StarCraft
8bff6f08-c2d0-4f1a-a360-b47235a92dea.summary: In a distant sector of the galaxy, three species—the Terrans, Zerg, and Protoss—battle for dominance in a real-time strategy environment.

d339faae-ba9f-4f2f-9680-aa6044e24acf.title: Satisfactory
d339faae-ba9f-4f2f-9680-aa6044e24acf.summary: A factory-building simulation game where players explore an alien planet, gather resources, and build complex production lines to create increasingly advanced products.

dce63f2a-987d-48fd-9c1c-f84d6de6d738.title: Wolf
dce63f2a-987d-48fd-9c1c-f84d6de6d738.summary: A simulation game where players take on the role of a wolf, learning to survive and thrive in a realistic wilderness environment.

e45af3c6-4103-4439-bbad-7f34c0016776.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
e45af3c6-4103-4439-bbad-7f34c0016776.summary: Link awakens from a long slumber to a world in ruin and must defeat Calamity Ganon to save the kingdom of Hyrule.

c655da5b-d4f0-4e8f-9a0e-a66aac0a88ad.title: Super Mario Galaxy
c655da5b-d4f0-4e8f-9a0e-a66aac0a88ad.summary: Mario travels across various galaxies to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, collecting Power Stars and encountering a variety of challenges and characters along the way.

267cd651-ce95-40f6-a6c5-d408f9d35ee0.title: Grand Theft Auto IV
267cd651-ce95-40f6-a6c5-d408f9d35ee0.summary: Niko Bellic, an Eastern European immigrant, comes to Liberty City to pursue the American Dream but gets entangled in a world of crime and corruption.

20bb25f4-29b1-4449-ad77-3fca15d4466f.title: SoulCalibur
20bb25f4-29b1-4449-ad77-3fca15d4466f.summary: A weapon-based fighting game where players use various characters, each with their own unique weapons and fighting styles, to battle against each other.
